attributes.action: This petition is a vote of no confidence in the priminister and Labour Government by the People Of Great Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Leave Downing Street and take the New Labour Dictatorship with you!

It has become apparent that Mr Brown is unable to lead or run England as a country.
Constant lies, and the destruction of what we have all been brought up on as a democracy has slowly and surely been stripped away by a man who has no qualification to be where he is let alone been an elected person.

Not one policy or any good has come from this man or his party to benefit  the UK in any way.

I have no confidence left in me where this Government are concerned.

Told lie after lie even to the point of trying to tell us that the UK is best suited to fight of a recession and it turns out we are in fact the worst country in the Europe to fight of a recession.

Enough is enough Gordon Brown go before more people die and suffer under your regime !

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
